name: Street Skater 3D
description:
Street Skater 3d is the game to play for all skate lovers out there. Play Street Skater 3d and improve your skating skills. Get as many coins as you can and purchase different skaters or upgrades for your power-ups. Choose between 2 different controller setups (buttons or accelerometer).
Street Skater 3d is all about skating your way through town. Avoid obstacles and cars. Try to set a highscore every single time you play. What are you waiting for? Download Street Skater 3d now!

Features:
- 6 different skaters.
- 2 power-ups to boost your performance.
- Continue feature included.
- Real skating moves and tricks.
- Excellent 3d graphics.
- Skating music all the way!
